meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Spirom is a lifestyle brand that fuses playfulness and sophisticated design under the concept of 'Cartoon for Grown-ups'.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.text1: Spirom was born from a simple idea: adults deserve to enjoy cartoons too. We bring the pop essence of cartoons and anime into adult lifestyles.
mission.text2: Everything we design balances playfulness with sophistication. Starting with apparel, we're expanding across categories to bring excitement to your everyday life.

items.title: PLAYFUL

items.title: SOPHISTICATED
items.description: Pop yet refined design. Quality that adults can wear with confidence.
